Name: Kevin Hogg
AboutMe:
First started programming with Basic on an Amstrad CPC 464 at the age of seven.

From 1996 spent ten years with Visual Basic (3 to 6, .NET 2003) developing applications for desktop and handheld devices (WinCE 3 to 6, Win Mobile, Windows Phone), heavy database development (MS Access, SQL Server 2000 to 2012, Data Warehousing, SSIS), and reporting.

Started programming with C# from 2006 to present, on windows, handheld, web services WCF, and websites.

These days Windows Phone development is a hobby, and I try to convince others that BI is not black magic and not just reporting.
